title: Is the new punishment system live in OCE yet?
body: It has been live in NA for a few weeks now.

replies.body:
I'd rather not get banned for saying gg easy.

We aren't as soft as NA plebs so it should just stay away form OCE, or at least be modified.
"gg easy" is being rude to your opponents though, so setting politeness standards is nice to see. Promotes more of the same.
No as theirs still garbage players in OCE.
